Compliance Services.name: ISO 9001
Compliance Services.subtitle: Quality Management Standard
Compliance Services.description: ISO 9001 is the most sought-after and internationally acclaimed management system standard to to improve operational and management efficiency and effectiveness. Attaining the ISO 9001 certification helps to drive the success of your business by boosting customer satisfaction, marketability, and profit potential.

Compliance Services.name: ISO 27001
Compliance Services.subtitle: Information Security Management System
Compliance Services.description: ISO 27001 was developed to specify the requirements to establish, implement, maintain, and continually improve the Information Security Management System (ISMS) of organizations. Obtaining the ISO 27001 certification demonstrates that they are able to protect their vital client information, employee data, finance/accounting information, intellectual property, and other third-party information.

Compliance Services.name: ISO 14001
Compliance Services.subtitle: Environmental Management Systems
Compliance Services.description: ISO 14001 ensures your business is executing ethical environmental practices on a daily basis. It provides tools and tips to reduce your environmental impact and improve environmental performance. Seeking an ISO 14001 certification gains the trust of customers and stakeholders that your business is running smoothly with environmentally conscious practices.

Compliance Services.name: ISO 45001
Compliance Services.subtitle: Occupation Health & Management Systems
Compliance Services.description: Make health and safety of your employees a priority. ISO 45001 provides a structured health and safety management system standard to help your organization.  ISO 45001 is universal and can be applied to any workplace regardless of industry. When your organization is ISO 45001 certified, it establishes your commitment to the health and welfare of your management and employees.

Compliance Services.name: ISO 17025
Compliance Services.subtitle: Competence of Testing & Calibration Labs
Compliance Services.description: ISO 17025 is based on ISO 9001 with a particular focus on testing and calibration bodies. Testing and calibration is a critical part of product development/product validation. Many of your customers need the assurance that their product meets the relevant standards and requirements before they report or launch.

Compliance Services.name: ISO 13485
Compliance Services.subtitle: Medical Devices Quality Management Systems
Compliance Services.description: ISO 13485 is based on ISO 9001 with a particular focus on Medical devices. Most industrialized countries have some forms of medical device regulation, i.e., the US Food and Drug Administration [FDA]. Before this standard, there was no single standard to harmonize the regulations for quality management systems globally making exporting difficult and precarious.

Compliance Services.name: ISO 20000
Compliance Services.subtitle: I.T. Service Management Systems
Compliance Services.description: ISO 20000 uses many of the principles of ISO 9001 similar to other management system standards, e.g., ISO 17025 (Laboratories), ISO 13485 (Medical Devices). ISO 20000 differentiates from ISO 9001 by specifying additional/other requirements that are specifically related to the IT service industry.

Compliance Services.name: ISO 31000
Compliance Services.subtitle: Risk Management
Compliance Services.description: ISO 31000 provides an organization with an internationally recognized method to identify potential risks such as financial risks, risks to reputation, safety risks, security risks, environmental risks, changes, etc. and mitigate their consequences where possible.
